Clear the media entry for a given prim face.

This is the equivalent of setting a media entry of null

MediaEntry OpenSim.Region.Framework.Interfaces.IMoapModule.GetMediaEntry ( ISceneChildEntity  part,
int  face 
)

Get the media entry for a given prim face.

A copy of the media entry is returned rather than the original, so this can be altered at will without affecting the original settings.

face
